Singular value decomposition

Source: R/ssa.fit.R
SVD.Rd

Singular value decomposition

Usage

SVD(y, L)

Arguments

y

A time series or a vector.

L

The window length.

Value

A list with the singular value decomposition.

Examples

SVD(AirPassengers[1:20], L=10)
#> $d
#>  [1] 1353.43594   96.12055   77.74330   64.22411   43.97117   28.34945
#>  [7]   23.29760   17.03133   12.56984   10.68864
